1.0.0.name: wordpress/theme-blvd-layout-builder
1.0.0.description:
NOTE: This plugin requires Theme Blvd framework v2.2.1+

When using a Theme Blvd theme, this plugin gives you slick interface to build custom layouts with the framework's core element functions. These custom layouts can then be applied to individual pages or your homepage. Additionally, you can use this plugin to extend this fuctionality to standard posts and custom post types.
